definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: It gives people hope and I'm really happy to be here to support Jesse.
sentences.chinese: 它給人們帶來希望，我很開心能到這來爲傑西助陣。

sentences.english: And so on will also boost the morale of members as the "Nine" back.
sentences.chinese: 等也將作爲助威團成員爲“九連”助陣。

sentences.english: French estimates were that the Viet Minh had minimal artillery support, and France was bound to win.
sentences.chinese: 據法國估計，越盟幾乎沒有大炮助陣，法軍勝券在握。

sentences.english: And he and actor Zhao Benshan perform during the concert.
sentences.chinese: 期間，演員趙本山也助陣朗朗的演奏會，雅俗共賞。

sentences.english: A shield before me is God who saves the honest heart.
sentences.chinese: 天主是我的護盾，給心正的人助陣。

definition: troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
